While in his [[Version 2|transformed]] state, [[Utakata]] can ooze an extremely [[Wikipedia:Alkali|alkaline]] liquid, which [[Wikipedia:Corrosive substance|burns]] upon contact. [[Killer B]] while in his [[Tailed Beast Mode|full Eight-Tails form]] commented that the substance was strong enough to burn through his skin. In the anime, when he used this technique in his Version 2 form, Utakata's chakra cloak turned blue.<ref name="ship324">''Naruto: Shippūden'' episode 324</ref>
